# cat-button-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Button groups are designed to bring together button controls that are of a
similar nature. For example text formatting controls.

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                                                         | Type                  | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `a11yLabel` | `a11y-label` | Adds an accessible label for the button group that it is only shown in assistive technologies, like screen readers. | `string \| undefined` | `undefined` |
